reviews.review: This game makes me hate my very existence and my friends don't like to play with me cause I'm bad. so yeah pick it up if you haven't.
Very sweaty, not enjoyable for new players
Um dos melhores jogos de FPS.

Valve wont fix MM.

1.) Team Killing is dumb. Griefing is so common it happens every other game. People will kill you for no reason or will do things to try and get you kicked out of games such as standing in your molotovs or running into your sprays.

2.) Getting high ranks by playing 1 map. I wish they would just make it so when you queue up for a game, there is a pick and ban phase for maps. This means if you want to get a high rank you have to earn it. None of this bullshit where you get high ranks playing garbage maps like seaside.

3.) Fuck 4 man premades. This ties in with the griefing thing, but it is annoying enough to get its own bullet point. A 4 man premade can kick you out of a game and grief you as much as they want. They can practically hold you hostage in the game. Remove 4 mans.

4.) Shit servers. Half the time I get a server with terrible server variance and a lot of rubber banding. How do I know its valve? I dont have this problem playing any other game and it only happens when I play on their servers. I am tired of checking net_graph and seeing that SV is at 8+, fix it. I would also like 128 tick servers in 2021 so I dont have to constantly change the way I bhop and throw smokes depending on the servers tick rate since I also play Facit.

This is just off the top of my head and there would be more if I thought it out. I hope valve fixes this shit someday, but its valve so probably not.
